document.docAuthor: Glowska, Eliza, Chrzanowski, Mateusz & Kaszewska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

heading.emphasis:
Genus
Megasyringophilus Fain, Bochkov and Mironov

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Megasyringophilus
Fain, Bochkov and Mironov, 2000
: 35
. Type-species:
Megasyringophilus kethleyi
Fain, Bochkov and Mironov, 2000
, by original designation.

aquilus
Skoracki, Lontkowski and Stawarczyk, 2010
: 1204
, figs. 1–5 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at ZMH , paratypes : females at ZMH . Hosts and distribution.
Cacatua galerita
( type host) ( Psittaciformes : Cacatuidae ), type-locality: AUSTRALIA , Mount Hart (
Glowska & Laniecka 2013
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
cyanocephala
Fain, Bochkov and Mironov, 2000
: 40
, figs. 13–22 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at ZIN (T-Sy-N 24 ), paratypes : male, teleonymphs at ZIN . Hosts and distribution.
Trichoglossus ornatus
( Psittaciformes : Psittacidae ), type-locality: INDONESIA , Sulawesi Isl. (
Bochkov & Fain 2003
).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females, nymphs, larvae at AMU , ZSM . Hosts and distribution.
Eos bornea
( type host) ( Psittaciformes : Psittacidae ), type-locality: INDONESIA , Ceram Isl. (
Skoracki 2005 c
).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females at AMU , ZSM . Hosts and distribution.
Geoffroyus geoffroyi
( type host) ( Psittaciformes : Psittacidae ), type-locality: NEW
GUINEA
(
Skoracki 2005 c
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
kethleyi
Fain, Bochkov and Mironov, 2000
: 37
, figs. 1–7 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at IRSNB ( 29032 ), paratypes : females, male, nymphs, larva at IRSNB , ZISP .

Type material.
Holotype female at IRSNB , paratypes : females, males at IRSNB , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Platycercus eximius
( Psittaciformes : Psittacidae ), type-locality: AUSTRALIA (
Bochkov & Fain 2003
).

Type material.
Holotype female at UNAM , female paratypes at UNAM , ZISP , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Rhynchopsitta pachyrhyncha
( type host) ( Psittaciformes : Psittacidae ), type-locality: MEXICO , Chihuahua, Mpio. Janos, Mesa de las Guacamayas (
Bochkov & Perez 2002
). Habitat. Unknown.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
trichoglossus
Fain, Bochkov and Mironov, 2000
: 37
, figs. 8–12 .
